name: Dream Land (mbarkho)
description:
Dream Land is a 2D platformer game. Our goal with this game was for the player to feel immersion and comedy in the actual story while making the game difficult enough to be actually enjoyable. Dream land achieves immersion and comedy using Dialogue throughout the levels which can be necessary to complete the levels  and Cinematics. As for the games difficulty, you will be running into enemies and dangerous environments which should provide a formidable challenge. 

Demo Video: 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tvxl4-8yrQY8pdyeBN-9cbKGYYlw3PQy/view

Dream Land's developers and their contributions:

Mathew Barkho: Levels(2-5), in-game UI/Sprite creation, and story.

Y Duong: Main Menu creation, Level1, and Cinematic.

We hope you enjoy Dream Land  and if you did please leave us a comment and let us know!
